message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I'm thinking of making a counteroffer. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer but $950000 is a bit too low for me. How about we split the difference and go with $1025000? This would allow me to still make a profit while giving you a good deal.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1000000 for the product. This is the highest I can go.
